name: Shoot For Fun's Sake
description:
A short solo shooter game requiring tactical skills to neutralize sensors before the sensor detection limit is exceeded.

Solo 3D First Person Shooter

  • WSAD or arrow keys to move, Left mouse to shoot.
  • Shots go where you aim - no random shot bloom.
  • Shoot or move, not both at the same time. Shooting and moving will cause a misfire.
  • Shooting sensors close to the centre causes more damage.
  • Levels can be played with a pistol or a rifle.
  • ESC to pause any time.

999,999 Select-able Re-playable Levels

  • Pick any level using the next/previous level buttons or by editing the game number.
  • Start on the left side of the level. Complete the level by reaching the endpoint across the level or by shooting all the sensors.
  • The level is reset if sensors detect you for more than a few seconds.
    The time to reset the level decreases for each extra sensor that can detect you.
  • Stats [accuracy, evasion time, sensors destroyed] are saved for completed levels. Badges are awarded for exceptional stats.
  • Levels 1, 2, 3 have reduced sensors.
  • Levels 500000 and above have extra sensors.
  • Levels 750000 and above have even more sensors.

Offline Single Player

  • No Ads. No Battle pass. No Micro-transactions. No Anti-Cheat system.
  • Game play is language agnostic.
